Articles.Content: I created a flag for my made-up government Kerbin government, the United Kerbin Administration. It's a global government, as I believe that Kerbals aren't corrupt and would have the capabilities to run the world under a single body with little consequence. Without further ado, here's the flag!
I like it.  This is the theme I too like to go with in my campaigns/careers (United Government), so I might just borrow this for my use in my game... lol.

8 hours ago, R-T-B said:

I like it.  This is the theme I too like to go with in my campaigns/careers (United Government), so I might just borrow this for my use in my game... lol.

Oh, go ahead and use it! I don’t really believe in the safeguarding of images.
